name: Mech game that should be dead

description:
Controls - Indicated in the "title screen" on game launch.

While this demo is radically different (and better) from the one submitted to DD16, it should be noted it still is an early version of what I hope to achieve. As such, gameplay is rough, unbalanced, and has some obvious bugs.
In short, this is more a "proof of concept" than a proper demo.
